title: Master ADC Searching for Support
body:
To introduce myself I am a long time adc/bot lane main that has hovered around challenger master elo for the last two season. I am wanting a support friend to help improve together and create an environment that is conducive for learning and allows room for mistakes. Some basic requirements to be met are:

Speaks English
Diamond 2 - Challenger Elo
Has decent microphone
Plays regularly

In Saying that I am also wanting a support that has similar values of the game to me. Someone who:

Is wanting to be competitve
Resists flaming in chat or blame like comments.
Knows when and how to give criticism and also understands how to receive criticism
Doesnâ€™t tilt for long periods of time. Who can recover from tilt  fairly easily

Some extra requirements that might come in later could be reviewing vods of LCK or watching the streams taking notes and doing analysis together. Playing other games outside of League of Legends together that might help to strengthen the friendship and blow of some steam or frustration.

Everything I expect from my support I expect from myself too. If you might be interested add me on my accounts Oomny and Oomny v1

replies.body: Added. Would like to talk to you in game! IGN: Hyper bluz0r
